actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works with amendment, S. Rept. 96-674.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 6169 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to establish the Bogue Chitto National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: (Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 6169 passed in lieu) Establishes the Bogue Chitto National Wildlife Refuge in the States of Louisiana and Mississippi. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation, purchase with donated or appropriated funds, or exchange lands, waters, or interest therein, within the boundaries of the refuge.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Bogue Chitto National Wildlife Refuge.
